Key Match Events: Justyn-Henry Malloy’s eighth-inning sacrifice fly helped the Detroit Tigers rally from a 3-0 deficit to move closer to the postseason with a 4-3 win over the Tampa Bay Rays.
Riley Greene singled off Garrett Cleavinger and Matt Vierling drew a walk in the eighth inning.
Colt Keith tied the game with an RBI single in the eighth inning.
Beau Brieske got the win with two innings of relief.
Jason Foley pitched the ninth for his 27th save.
